name: Red Riding Hood (itch) (jayl97)
description:
SpaceQW JumpSlideStand

Red Riding Hood is going to her grandma's to deliver her bread. Wolves stand in the way between you and grandma's. Can you make it before the eat you?

You have 3 lives, collecting hearts to fill the bar resets your lives.

Assets

Music and Sound Effects

  • Munching Food - Used For Bread Noise
  • https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/munching-food-73994/
